title.title: From test to ticket: effortless bug tracking with ReportPortal

contentfulBlogPost.seoDescription: Report bugs directly from test results with BTS plugins for our test results dashboard
contentfulBlogPost.author: ReportPortal Team

articleBody.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you're looking to improve bug visibility and optimize test management workflows, integrating bug tracking systems (BTS) with ReportPortal is an efficient way. This allows you to log, view, and manage issues, making defect tracking smoother and faster.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This article explores the most popular BTS plugins supported by ReportPortal, their features, and how they can enhance your QA process.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"What are BTS plugins?","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"BTS plugins connect ReportPortal to external issue tracking. This allows you to: ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Submit tickets right from failed test cases. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Link issues to test results for better traceability. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"View existing issues without switching tools.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Benefits of integration with BTS","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Easier bug reporting 
No need to open your BTS and create defects manually – create bugs right from ReportPortal in just a few clicks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"High-quality bug reports
